story:
Once upon a time, in the beautiful land of Armenia, there lived a young boy named Aram. Aram was a curious and adventurous child who loved to explore the mountains and valleys, and he had a special friend named Ani, a colorful bird with shimmering feathers.

Every night before bedtime, Aram and Ani would sit under the starlit sky, listening to the rustling of the wind in the trees. Ani would tell Aram stories of faraway lands and magical creatures, while Aram would share his dreams and wishes with his feathered friend.

One night, as they were gazing at the twinkling stars, Ani whispered to Aram, "Close your eyes and make a wish upon the brightest star in the sky." Aram closed his eyes tightly and made a wish with all his heart.

The next morning, Aram woke up to a soft tap at his window. When he opened it, he saw a beautiful flower blooming with radiant petals of every color imaginable. Ani chirped happily, "Your wish has been granted, dear Aram. The magic of the stars has brought us this gift of beauty."

Aram and Ani spent the day exploring the meadows and dancing with the butterflies, grateful for the wonders of the world around them. As the sun began to set, they sat once again under the starlit sky, feeling the warmth of the day's adventures in their hearts.

And so, night after night, Aram and Ani continued their bedtime ritual, sharing stories and dreams under the watchful gaze of the twinkling stars. Their bond grew even stronger, and their friendship blossomed like the petals of the magical flower that had appeared at Aram's window.

And as they drifted off to sleep each night, Aram whispered a silent thank you to the stars above for blessing him with the most precious gift of all - the gift of a true and loyal friend in Ani. Together, they knew that no matter where their adventures took them, their friendship would always shine brightly like the stars in the sky.

And so, dear child, remember to always cherish the friends who fill your heart with joy and magic, just like Aram and Ani did under the starlit Armenian sky. Goodnight, sweet dreams, and may the stars always guide you on your own wondrous journey.
